snippet: Investors and game-making companies are counting on the talent and passion of young people to help build a vibrant Arab gaming industry and conquer a share of the potentially lucrative market, reports Dania Saadi in Thursday's International Herald...
abstract: Investors and game-making companies are counting on the talent and passion of young people to help build a vibrant Arab gaming industry and conquer a share of the potentially lucrative market, reports Dania Saadi in Thursday's International Herald Tribune.
lead_paragraph: Investors and game-making companies are counting on the talent and passion of young people to help build a vibrant Arab video game industry and conquer a share of the potentially lucrative market, reports Dania Saadi in Thursday's International Herald Tribune. Read the entire article.

headline.main: Making a Play for an Arab Video Game Industry
